#id=1
#text=Riding a public bus is a good way to get around a city .
#id=2
#text=If I am traveling in a big city , I think it 's easier to take the bus than depend on my car .
#id=3
#text=In Chicago , I can get anywhere in the city more quickly and inexpensively using public transit .
#id=4
#text=First , I look online to find the stop nearest to where my hotel is .
#id=5
#text=Then I plan out the stops i want to make .
#id=6
#text=Maybe I am going to a museum or the zoo .
#id=7
#text=I find the bus routes that go where I want to go .
#id=8
#text=I go to the bus stop and wait for the bus to come along .
#id=9
#text=Then I hop on and pay my fare .
#text=I like to sit by the window and get a good glimpse of the city I am in .
#text=Sometimes I will even see something that catches my eye and I will get off before I planned !
#text=When it 's time for me to depart , I pull the cord and let the driver know I want to get off .
#text=Then I get off at the next opportunity and continue on with my day without needing to deal with parking !
